part_description: Features multiple buttons arranged in rows; top curved.
internal_interaction_description: Buttons interact with internal circuitry to send signals when pressed. Each button corresponds to specific functions, activating electronic components that communicate commands to external devices.
external_interaction_description: Used to control electronic devices like TVs or stereos remotely. Sends infrared signals to devices, allowing users to change settings without physical contact. Requires line of sight for effective operation.
